Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

Malice:
 
The TM2 dinosaur sighed and trucked off after her, slowly picking up speed as he went.  He caught up to her, a bit out of breath.
 
"In... a ...hurry?" he asked between breaths.
 
The sun felt good on his chrome and black exterior, something he never noticed too often.  Wide open spaces, a lovely femmebot to run with, another back at base, the only thing he regretted was being unable to choose one over the other.  Oh well.

Dark Mouse <raccoon7679@...> wrote:
WOlfblade:

She grinned and transformed into wolf mode. Her forearm lazar blasters
were always ready. She smiled a wolfish grin to him. "Excersize you
want? Excersize you get. Just try to keep up." she said teasing him,
and took off towards the entrance. She grinned as she passed the front
doors and saw sky again. 


"HA!  Is that all you got?  You boasted such power, such skill!  Where is your power and skill now?  You disappoint me, ha ha ha haa!" 

__________________________________________________
